description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Can you keep the beat and crush your foes? Using instrument-based controllers, Battle Beat combines the action of rhythm games with strategic elements to create a unique gameplay experience. Choose your squads and duke it out over the fate of your nondescript post-apocalyptic home world, fighting off massive hordes of aliens!
